name: Slimes in the clouds
description:
Hi, this is a very indie game, it tells the story of a boy that lost his memory and end up in the clouds... Are you capable to figure out all the secrets behind the clouds ? well the rest of the story you gonna find during the gameplay but it is very challenging and your scores get saved for the remaining plays.

Hope you all enjoy!!

for feedbacks p.machado080493@gmail.com
